bridge-type.label: Regular Poll
bridge-type.description: Regular poll of data from Modbus slaves

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Poll Interval
parameter.description: Poll interval in milliseconds. Use zero to disable automatic polling.

parameter.name: start
parameter.label: Start
parameter.description:
Address of the first register, coil, or discrete input to poll.

Input as zero-based index number, e.g. in place of 400001 (first holding register), use the address 0.

parameter.name: length
parameter.label: Length
parameter.description:
Number of registers, coils or discrete inputs to read.

Maximum number of registers is 125 while 2000 is maximum for coils and discrete inputs.

parameter.name: type
parameter.label: Type
parameter.description: Type of modbus items to poll

parameter.name: maxTries
parameter.label: Maximum Tries When Reading
parameter.description: Number of tries when reading data, if some of the reading fail. For single try, enter 1.

parameter.name: cacheMillis
parameter.label: Cache Duration
parameter.description:
Duration for data cache to be valid, in milliseconds. This cache is used only to serve REFRESH commands.

Use zero to disable the caching.
